topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume E–9, Part 2, Documents on the Middle East Region, 1973–1976
topic.body: This volume documents the Nixon and Ford administration’s management of the political, economic, and strategic effects of the October 1973 Arab-Israeli war.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume E–9, Part 2, Documents on the Middle East Region, 1973–1976
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
